response.original_title: Neal Morse and Friends: A Year in Neal's Life at Morsefest 2019
response.overview: This month’s Inner Circle is audio and video footage from the 2019 Morsefest Inner Circle Concert.  The concert was a chance for Neal to perform and tell the stories of some of the songs he had written since the previous Morsefest.  It includes some classics, like “All On A Sunday” (which Neal had never performed solo before!) to new songs like “Coffee in Seattle” and “Leavin’ Vancouver.”  Neal is joined by some great friends and tells the stories behind all of the songs.  –TRACK LIST– All On A Sunday Leavin’ Vancouver Perfectly Winter Wonderland It’s Christmas Time At Last Rollin’ Like A Stone Coffee In Seattle If Jesus Came Today Sanctuary Flyin’ Solo I’m Gonna Miss You When You Go Love Of My Life As Long As I’m With You She Always Encouraged Me Love Has Called My Name
response.title: Neal Morse and Friends: A Year in Neal's Life at Morsefest 2019
